articles.title: Sorry, Samsung, Apple! This $600 phone is everything Galaxy S23 Ultra, iPhone 14 Pro will never be - PhoneArena
articles.description: The $600 Android flagship with an invisible selfie camera, almost zero display borders, and pro-level cameras makes Galaxy S23 Ultra and iPhone 14 Pro look more overpriced than ever!
articles.content:
Pricing for the ZTE Nubia Z50 Ultra is as follows
  • 8 GB & 256 GB: CNY 3,999 (~US$580)
  • 12 GB & 256 GB: CNY 4,299 (~US$625)
  • 12 GB & 512 GB: CNY 4,699 (~US$670)
